fr.upmc.colins.farm3.cpu

Class Cpu

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.upmc.components.AbstractComponent
      • fr.upmc.colins.farm3.cpu.Cpu
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.upmc.components.ComponentI

    public class Cpu
extends fr.upmc.components.AbstractComponent
    The class Cpu implements a component that simulates a central processing unit.

    Description

    This component also create in its constructor the cores. The Cpu component is parameterized with a default clock speed, a maximum clock speed and a number of cores.

    Created on : 23 nov. 2014

    Version:
    $Name$ -- $Revision$ -- $Date$
    Author:
    Colins-Alasca

    throws java.lang.Exception
        create a CPU with its cores
        Parameters:
        cpuId - unique identifier of the cpu
        nrofCores - number of cores
        clockSpeed - clock speed of the cpu's cores
        maxClockSpeed - maximum clock speed of the cpu's cores
        controlInboundPortURI - URI of the inbound port to connect to the admission control

        java.lang.Exception
